turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Good evening. Yes, please. I want you to help me place an order for pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want two large pizzas with extra cheese on veggie lover's as toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm okay with that Pretty Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 2 large veggie lovers with extra cheese. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, you can place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: done. your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much. Bye.
